name: dokploy
description: Dokploy is a self-hosted platform for deploying applications using a modern web UI. It supports Docker-based deployments, databases, custom domains, SSL, and secrets, aiming to simplify app hosting for individuals and small teams.
features: Application Deployment: Deploy applications from Git repositories with automatic builds and Docker containerization.
Database Management: Provision and manage PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Redis databases with backup automation.
Domain Configuration: Set up custom domains with automatic SSL certificate generation and renewal via Let's Encrypt.
Environment Variables: Secure management of application secrets and environment variables with encryption.
Monitoring Dashboard: Real-time application monitoring with logs, metrics, and health status visualization.
Git Integration: Connect with GitHub, GitLab, and other Git providers for automated deployments on code changes.
Load Balancing: Built-in load balancer with health checks and automatic failover for high availability.
Backup System: Automated database and application backups with configurable retention policies.
Team Collaboration: Multi-user support with role-based access control and project sharing capabilities.
Resource Management: Monitor and control CPU, memory, and storage usage with scaling recommendations.
CI/CD Pipeline: Integrated continuous integration and deployment with custom build scripts and testing.
One-click Apps: Pre-configured application templates for popular frameworks and services with instant deployment.
